summary: Implemented requested backend updates for Beauty Booking: added Notifications API with unread counting and mark-read; added Dashboard summary endpoint; enabled booking conversation send with file support and ascending retrieval; enforced 24h cancel/reschedule rule with 422 cancellation_window_passed plus cancellation_fee/deadline; added slot availability validation with 422 slot_unavailable; aligned pagination for list endpoints including top-rated, monthly-top-rated, popular, loyalty campaigns; added wallet transactions endpoint filtered to beauty transaction types; ensured payment_method "online" maps to digital_payment. Migration adds read_at to user_notifications.
current_status: Code updated and routes wired under existing auth:api middleware; pagination metadata returned via BeautyApiResponse; migration created for read_at; no linter errors reported.
